meta.job_title: Director of Mental and Physical Wellbeing

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic leadership for the development and implementation of mental and physical wellbeing programs to support the organization's mission.
Lead the research, design, and innovation of specialized products and services for mental and physical wellbeing, ensuring their alignment with organizational goals.
Establish and maintain strong partnerships with external stakeholders, shaping FH as a thought leader in mental and physical wellbeing on a global scale.
Provide operational leadership and guidance for improving program quality and sustainability in the field of mental and physical wellbeing.
Engage in demand-driven professional services to support the operational excellence of mental and physical wellbeing programs.
Publish well-researched articles and participate in relevant forums to demonstrate thought leadership in the field of mental and physical wellbeing.
Supervise and lead a team of staff, ensuring their professional development and effective performance in alignment with organizational policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mental and Physical Wellbeing (Master’s degree preferred or equivalent combination of education and experience)
